name: Loxodon
description: Loxodons are calm, patient, and stoic humanoids with the thick, leathery skin of elephants. They are pillars of their communities, often acting as cornerstones of tranquility and strength.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Loxodon Serenity
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Natural Armor
traits.description: You have thick, leathery skin. When you arenâ€™t wearing armor, your AC is 12 + your Constitution modifier.

traits.name: Trunk
traits.description: You can grasp things with your trunk, and you can use it as a snorkel. It has a reach of 5 feet, and it can lift a number of pounds equal to five times your Strength score. You can use it to do the following simple tasks: lift, drop, hold, push, or pull an object or a creature; open or close a door or a container; grapple someone; or make an unarmed strike. Your DM might allow other simple tasks to be added to that list of options.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: Thanks to your sensitive trunk, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception), Wisdom (Survival), and Intelligence (Investigation) checks that involve smell.
